properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND STATUS ='N'
INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, "MEMBER_NAME", "EMAIL", "MEMBER_NIC") VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NAME=?, MEMBER_NIC=?, EMAIL = ? , MODI_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = ?, MODI_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' , MODI_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NAME=? AND EMAIL=?
SELECT MEMBER_PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_NAME = ? AND EMAIL = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ( SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_NAME = ? AND EMAIL = ? )

SELECT POST_NO,
POST_TITLE, MEMBER_NIC, READ_COUNT, CREATE_DATE
FROM CIRCLE C
JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS='N' AND M.STATUS='N' AND MEMBER_ID=?
SELECT COUNT(*) READ_COUNT FROM CIRCLE WHERE STATUS = 'N'

SELECT POST_NO,
POST_TITLE, MEMBER_NIC, READ_COUNT, CREATE_DATE
FROM CAMP_REVIEW R
JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS='N' AND M.STATUS='N' AND MEMBER_ID=?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = ?
